text: ai logon! jinhen kitaab dee gaee, us cheej ko maano jo hamane utaaree hai, jo usakee pushti mein hai, jo svayan tumhaare paas hai, isase pahale ki ham cheharon kee rooparekha ko mitaakar rakh den aur unhen unake peechh kee or pher den ya unapar laanat karen, jis prakaar hamane sabtavaalon par laanat kee thee. aur allaah ka aadesh to laagoo hokar hee rahata hai
